text: Asplenium ascensionis is a species of fern in the family Aspleniaceae. It is endemic to Ascension Island. Its natural habitats are receding due to introduced vegetation. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== ascensionis Category:Near threatened plants Category:Flora of Ascension Island Category:Plants described in 1891 Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Asplenium ascensionis
